content.raw:
We may also consider removing the installation of deprecated header files on case-sensitive file systems (#775). This is done by calling the [gz_issue_775 cmake macro](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e560b08aabf3e9a8d435b2e7d57133625ae7b85e/cmake/GazeboUtils.cmake?at=default#cl-158):
~~~
$ grep -rnI gz_issue_775 gazebo
gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt:160:gz_issue_775("Common")
gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt:162:gz_issue_775("Gui")
gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:113:gz_issue_775("Physics")
gazebo/rendering/CMakeLists.txt:151:gz_issue_775("Rendering")
gazebo/sensors/CMakeLists.txt:94:gz_issue_775("Sensors")
gazebo/transport/CMakeLists.txt:63:gz_issue_775("Transport")
~~~
content.html:
We may also consider removing the installation of deprecated header files on case-sensitive file systems (#775). This is done by calling the gz_issue_775 cmake macro:

$ grep -rnI gz_issue_775 gazebo
gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt:160:gz_issue_775("Common")
gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt:162:gz_issue_775("Gui")
gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:113:gz_issue_775("Physics")
gazebo/rendering/CMakeLists.txt:151:gz_issue_775("Rendering")
gazebo/sensors/CMakeLists.txt:94:gz_issue_775("Sensors")
gazebo/transport/CMakeLists.txt:63:gz_issue_775("Transport")
